item.description:
(yes this is a saturday night not friday the 30th).

9 pm: Barry’s Night
Barry’s Barry’ Barry’s Video Dance Club – Halloween Costume Party. Prizes awarded for best costumes.

1st Prize: Accommodations for 2 at the exclusive Hotel Providence & dinner at the award-winning restaurant “Aspire”
2nd Prize: $150 tazza Caffe Gift Card
3rd Prize: One excellent gift basket

I think the cover charge is $5. Not sure how elaborately I will dress but this will probably be fun. If it's lame, we can move to Local 121 after 11pm (that's free).
item.name: Halloween Party at Tazza
